snippet: The group’s new president, Ahmad Jarba, is a tribal sheik from northeastern Syria and is seen as close to the government of Saudi Arabia.
abstract: Syrian National Coalition elects tribal leader and former political prisoner Ahmad al-Jarba as president in attempt to show that it can unite, organize and arm opposition fighters in Syria.
lead_paragraph: The group’s new president, Ahmad Jarba, is a tribal sheik from northeastern Syria and is seen as close to the government of Saudi Arabia.

headline.main: Trying to End Rifts, Syria Opposition in Exile Elects President
headline.print_headline: Trying to End Divisions, Syrian Opposition in Exile Elects President

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
